body_html: @peterjc123 clang-cl with sccache now works locally and I've uploaded the new sccache binary. We will need to change the LLVM download file to LLVM-6.0.1-rC331533.7z, and then change the set CC=sccache cl and set CXX=sccache cl lines in the original build script to set CC=sccache clang-cl and set CXX=sccache clang-cl.
body_text: @peterjc123 clang-cl with sccache now works locally and I've uploaded the new sccache binary. We will need to change the LLVM download file to LLVM-6.0.1-rC331533.7z, and then change the set CC=sccache cl and set CXX=sccache cl lines in the original build script to set CC=sccache clang-cl and set CXX=sccache clang-cl.
body: @peterjc123 clang-cl with sccache now works locally and I've uploaded the new sccache binary. We will need to change the LLVM download file to `LLVM-6.0.1-rC331533.7z`, and then change the `set CC=sccache cl` and `set CXX=sccache cl` lines in the original build script to `set CC=sccache clang-cl` and `set CXX=sccache clang-cl`.
